newsitem.title: USA: Berger Holdings H1 revs $10 million.
newsitem.headline: Berger Holdings H1 revs $10 million.

text.p: Berger Holdings Ltd said Thursday it had revenues of $10.0 millon for the first half of the year ended June 30, and that it expects to report "record" net income for the same period.
The company also said it has received a commitment for a $5 million credit facility from Summit Bank.
The company said this agreement will reduce its current borrowing costs by 275 basis points.
The company also said this new banking relationship establishes a potential source of additional debt capital for future acquisitions.
